Text: NESAHEA Renewal Last Calla last reminder that you havent renewed your NESAHEA dues We are in the process of preparing to publish our annual directory and are hopeful that you will take a moment to renew your dues so that you are included If you have misplaced your form please visit our website at wwwnesanetorg and click on WHAT IS NESA or call the office at and we can update your records over the phone with a credit card Dues are only and you dont want to be left out Let us hear from you or if you wish to be deleted just respond to this message Thanks for your consideration and we hope youll renew your dues Teresa Knight Vice President Membership NESAHEA Fax

NESAHEA Directory Survey Cc NESAHEA Members In an effort to control costs and to provide more timely current information we are considering putting the annual directory online via our website We want your opinion regarding your personal preference so please take a minute to reply to this email noting the following options below and underlining your choice I appreciate your input and hope you have a great weekend MAINTAIN THE PRINTED DIRECTORY ONLY PROVIDE AN ELECTRONIC ONLINE VERSION ONLY WITH UPDATE CAPABILITY PROVIDE BOTH A PRINTED AND ELECTRONIC VERSION MAKE A CD VERSION AVAILABLE TO THOSE WHO DONT HAVE ONLINE CAPABILITY Teresa Knight Vice President Membership NESAHEA Fax

Your Vote is Required by November th Cc Ladies and Gentlemen Attached is a letter from Bill Harper NESAHEA President on behalf of the Board of Directors asking you to vote on amending the name of the Association from NESAHEA to NESA Please read the letter and cast your eballot by November by replying to this message either FOR or AGAINST Sincerely Teresa A Knight Vice President Member Services NESAHEA NAME CHANGE RECOMMENDATION TO MEMBERS doc

NESAHEAs th Annual Crawfish Boil Cc time again crawfish are in season and NESAHEA is geared up to make sure you enjoy your fill on Tuesday April th Held again at Woodrows located at Chimney Rock the fun will start at pm and continues until pm in advance covers all the crawfish jambalaya and beer or margaritas you can hold or pay at the door Either way drop a business card in the bowl when you register and participate in a drawing for an Astros vs Braves game to be played in late April courtesy of Michael Roberts Shell Trading To register print off this form and mail it in with your check to NESAHEA N Eldridge Parkway Suite Houston Texas or simply fill in your credit card information and fax it back to Dont miss this great annual event sponsored in part by PACE GLOBAL MANHATTAN RESOURCES SHELL GAS TRANSMISSION See you then Name Company Name Guest Name Guest Company Name Credit Card Expiration Date Teresa Knight Vice President Membership NESAHEA

NESAHEA Board of Director Nominations Cc Jpst OLEObj June TO ALL MEMBERS NESAHEA FROM GREGORY A DODD COChair NESAHEA Nominating Committee RE SLATE OF DIRECTORS NESAHEA Board of Directors Ladies Gentlemen The NESAHEA Nominating Committee met to consider possible nominees for the term on the NESAHEA Board of Directors The Committee has selected what it considers to be the four most qualified individuals to fill those terms They are listed below for your consideration Pat Bracewell Manager Cross Regional Accounts Tennessee Gas Pipeline Co Julie Gomez Vice President Enron North America Betsy McMahon Manager Oil Gas Supply AEP West AEP Energy Services Inc Rob Pirt Director Northern Development TransCanada PipeLines The ballot will be sent to all Voting members for action on or before August To receive a ballot and be eligible to vote you must be a Voting member of NESAHEA with dues paidinfull prior to ballot mailing If you have a question about your membership status please contact Eva M Pollard Director of Member Services at Again this letter is for informational purposes only No action is required at this time GADgnomjun

MIXER TOMORROW THURSDAY JANUARY ST Cc pst Dont forget to meet us tomorrow evening from pm at the Boaka Bar downtown Located at Prairie the Boaka Bar is right next door to the Mercury Room and your first drink is free Bring a new member with you who pays their dues onsite and youll be entered into a drawing for HOUSTON TEXAN tickets The member who brings the most guests will win tickets to this years HOUSTON LIVESTOCK SHOW RODEO so come out and bring your friends Also mark your calendar for February ths Storage Economics Brown Bag email Lana Moore for details at The next Technical Training class will be March Nominations thru Allocationsand Lana can help with your registration on that as well Have a good week and Ill see you at the Boaka Bar TERESA A KNIGHT Vice President Member Services Fax

Sunshine Kids Benefit Golf Tournament March th Cc pst Dear Members NESA is pleased to be holding its rd Annual Benefit Golf Tournament on Monday March th at the prestigious Champions Golf Club Proceeds will again benefit The Sunshine Kids Foundation This is your opportunity to secure a corporate or individual sponsorship which includes a foursome or a single tee time respectively for this outstanding tournament and great cause Attached are registration forms NESA has been proud to donate over in the last two years to local charities through this tournament and we need your help to continue to do so If you have any questions please feel free to email me or call me at Dont forget about our mixer on Thursday January st at the Boaka Bar downtown No cover first drink free cant beat it RSVP to me if you can make it Visit their website for directions at wwwmercuryroomcomboakaboakahtml TERESA A KNIGHT Vice President Member Services Fax INVITE LETTER INDIVIDUAL REGISTRATION FORMdoc INVITE LETTER SPONSOR REGISTRATION FORMdoc INVITE LETTER INDIVIDUAL REGISTRATION FORMdoc INVITE LETTER SPONSOR REGISTRATION FORMdoc

MEMBERSHIP MIXER JANUARY Cc pst Happy New Year NESA is kicking off our calendar of events with a mixer on Thursday January from pm until pm downtown at the Boaka Bar The Boaka Bar is located at Prairie right next to the Mercury Room Make plans now to join us theres no cover and your first drink is FREE Take this opportunity to renew your dues and encourage your colleagues to join as well Everyone who sponsors new members between today and January will be entered into a special drawing for HOUSTON TEXAN tickets must be present to win You can bring those new members with you and they can register at Boaka Bar so mark your calendar for Thursday January and meet us downtown You can RSVP to this email just to let us know youre coming and include the name of your guest if youre bringing one TERESA A KNIGHT Vice President Member Services Fax

MEMBERSHIP MIXER TOMORROW PAESANOS LOUNGEMembers Dont forget to join us tomorrow Thursday January th for our first Membership Mixer of at PAESANOS LOUNGE located at Milam between Franklin and Congress Streets in the downtown Market District Sponsored by NATIONAL ENERGY TRADE LLC the fun begins at pm and your first drink is free when you mention youre with NESAHEA at the door There will be a buffet available for our group as well as valet parking Remember that PAESANOS also offers a great selection of fine cigars for your enjoyment while you network with other industry colleagues and special guest artist YVONNE WASHINGTON performs at pm Were expecting a great turnout so dont be left out As part of our Membership Drive bring a new member with you and become eligible for a great door prize graciously donated by Kay Atchison NESAHEA CoChair from Duke Energy Its a great opportunity to renew your dues as well Again if you didnt receive your renewal in the mail Im attaching a pdf file that can be opened in Adobe Acrobat If you dont have that application download it FREE from our website at wwwnesanetorg Hope to see you there You cant afford to miss this event NESANEAmembershippdf NESANEAmembershippdf

NESAHEA RENEWALS DUE MARCH NESAHEA Members Just a reminder that you should have received your renewal for in December Your application is due by March so dont delay in returning your form and payment for as soon as possible to ensure that you are in this years directory If you did not receive your renewal you can go to our website at wwwnesanetorg and print an application to use Be sure and include your email address Also ENERGY EXPO is right around the corner March at the George R Brown Delegate registration information is available at the website as well Advance registration deadline is February rd so get your registration in to avoid the additional fee Make sure to attend the General Session and come by the NESAHEA booth for your chance in the prize drawings Pipeline Updates will also be available during the trade show hours so dont miss this opportunity to gain some valuable industry insight and information as well as catch up with your business contacts Well see you then TERESA A KNIGHT Vice President Membership

RODEO ROUNDUP MIXER FEBRUARY Cc Members Get your boots and hats out if youre not wearing them today and join us on Wednesday February at the LONGHORN UPTOWN CAFE located on the th floor of the Park Shops McKinney Roundup starts at pm and your first drink is on us Fixins will be available at the Longhorns happy hour buffet and bring your parking ticket from the Houston Center Garage with you Theyll validate your first hours of parking Door prizes will be awarded to the BEST WESTERN DRESSED male and female so put your best duds on and bring your renewal with you This will also be a great chance for you to register for ENERGY EXPO at the reduced rate Fees go up on February rd so take advantage of this last call Thanks to Shell Gas Transmission and Caminus for underwriting a portion of this event RSVP by replying to this email Have a great weekend and well look for you on the st

NESAs th Annual Crawfish BoilMark your calendar now for Thursday April Make plans to join us at our th Annual Crawfish Boil at Woodrows Chimney Rock for crawfish jambalaya beer and margaritas all for in advance or at the door Just complete the bottom portion of this email and reply to me or print it off and fax to our office at You can use your credit card or mail this form with your check Everyone who registers in advance will be eligible for a private drawing a second drawing will apply for the member who brings the most guests with them So pass the word and dont miss out on the fun NAME COMPANY NAME GUEST NAME GUEST COMPANY NAME CREDIT CARD EXPIRATION DATE Thanks again to our corporate sponsors of the year AQUILA INC DYNEGY AND EL PASO TERESA A KNIGHT Vice President Member Services Fax

NESAs th Annual Crawfish Boil April Cc Make sure you have Thursday April on your calendar for a date with NESA and lots of mud bugs Join us from pm until pm at our th Annual Crawfish Boil at Woodrows Chimney Rock for crawfish jambalaya beer and margaritas all for in advance or at the door Just complete the bottom portion of this email and reply to me or print it off and fax to our office at You can use your credit card or mail this form with your check Everyone who registers in advance will be eligible for a private drawing for HOUSTON TEXAN tickets a second drawing for ASTROS dugout tickets compliments of MICHAEL ROBERTS with Cinergy will apply for the member who brings the most guests with them So pass the word and dont miss out on the fun LAISSEZ LES BON TEMPS ROULE NAME COMPANY NAME GUEST NAME GUEST COMPANY NAME CREDIT CARD EXPIRATION DATE Thanks again to our corporate sponsors of the year AQUILA INC DYNEGY AND EL PASO TERESA A KNIGHT Vice President Member Services Fax

NESA MEMBERSHIP RENEWALSJust a reminder that we still havent received your renewal and dues for Please take a moment to do so and if you cant find your original renewal application use the attached form and just fax it in with your credit card payment or mail it with your check I hope to see you at our CRAWFISH BOIL on April th at Woodrows on Chimney Rock Also keep in mind our Brown Bag Field Trip on the MV Sam Houston April our Spring Mixer in New York April and the Risk Management Technical Training classes on April Have a great day and a wonderful week I look forward to hearing from you soon and hope you wont delay in making sure you dont miss out on any upcoming NESA notices Membershippdf Calendar of Events doc TERESA A KNIGHT Vice President Member Services Fax

Sports Tourney Update NE Mixer News Cc NESAHEA Members Remember that Monday October is the early registration deadline for the th Annual Sports Tournament coming up on October nd at the Woodlands Country Club If your registration AND payment are received by close of business Monday you are automatically entered into a special door prize drawing to be awarded at the dinner Monday evening so get those forms in Visit our website at wwwnesanetorg if you have deleted the prior email with the pdf attached or call the office and well fax you one Secondly please read the attached letter from Bill Harper regarding the rescheduling of the NE Summit and Mixer I look forward to seeing you all at the Sports Tournament NORTHEAST RESCHEDULE NOTICEdoc TERESA A KNIGHT Vice President Member Services Fax

th Annual Sports Tournament October Cc Dear NESAHEA Members Just a quick reminder that the Sports Tournament is just a month away so please take the time to review the attached files and send in your registration today If you havent yet renewed for this is an excellent time to do so and have your dues covered for Additionally there are still a few selected sponsorships available LONGEST DRIVES BEVERAGE CARTS and HOLE SPONSORSHIPS Give us a call at the office and ask for me or Eva Pollard or contact one of our PRIZE COMMITTEE members Charles Neuberger Mirant Americas Energy Ed Troutman CMS Field Services or Jana Phillips Calpine I hope to see you all in October Have a great day and God bless America PDFSport Tourneypdf

An Invitation for NESAHEA Members from the GPAGreetings from the HOUSTON CHAPTER OF THE GPA A special invitation to our NESA friends Come meet and socialize with your GPA counterparts Join us for a GREAT evening of fun and food The membership year has begun and it is time to join us for the Membership Drive and Shrimp Boil Social Bring a colleague and future member Wednesday September PM to Dark Bear Creek Park Pavilion Bear Creek Drive Take I to Eldridge north to Clay and west to Bear Creek Drive Please RSVP your attendance only by email back to me by Sept Due to the large number of mergers and corporate email address changes please help me contact fellow colleagues by forwarding this email to others who may be interested Also please mark your calendars for the following events September Shrimp Boil Bear Creek Park October AM Regional Meeting The Woodlands October PM Golf Tournament The Woodlands November Luncheon Meeting TBA January Luncheon Meeting TBA February Luncheon Meeting TBA April Luncheon Meeting TBA May Luncheon Meeting TBA TBA Sporting Clay Shoot American Shooting Center Below are the Shrimp Boil flier Sponsorship form and Membership form Please post them in a common area of your office building or circulate them through your work group Membership form pdf Shrimp Boil pdf Sponsor form pdf Alfred Fatica Secretary Treasurer HGPA BP Corporation Work Fax Membership form pdf Shrimp Boil pdf Sponsor form pdf

NESAHEA Bylaws Notice Cc All NESAHEA Members Attached is a copy of the revised Bylaws as drafted by the Executive Committees Transition Team The Transition Team was charged with among other duties reviewing the two sets of bylaws of NESA and HEA and to combine the two into one document that would best serve the association The Team has prepared a revised set of bylaws that is more consistent with how the combined organization operates and is asking for your vote to approve them Please email your response to revise the attached bylaws to Bill Harper NESAHEA President at as soon as possible The results will be announced at the Annual Meeting in San Antonio on September Thank you for your cooperation and assistance Sincerely Teresa Knight Vice President Member Services NESAHEA BYLAWS TO MEMBERSdoc

See you Monday August th in Dallas Cc Dont forget to join us on Monday August th at Cityplace just outside downtown Dallas to hear TRRC Chairman MICHAEL L WILLIAMS and DAVID DEWHURST Commissioner of the Texas General Land Office present their views of the state of the energy industry in Texas Cityplace is located at N Haskell and registration will begin at am in the foyer of the Turtle Creek I Ballroom where a cash bar will be available Lunch service begins at noon and Chairman Williams will speak at pm followed by Commissioner Dewhurst For directions to Cityplace please call NESAHEA members pay only in advance or at the door All registrations received wishing to pay at the door will be billed if you do not attend Nonmembers pay or can pay which includes NESAHEA membership through Dress is business casual Fax in the bottom portion of this message with your credit card payment or payment will be required at the door at that rate of for members and for nonmembers Dont delay We have a great turnout already registered See you on the th in Dallas NAME COMPANY NESAHEA MEMBER PHONE NUMBER CREDIT CARD NUMBER EXPIRATION DATE AMOUNT PAID TERESA A KNIGHT Vice President Member Services Fax

NESAHEA Sporting Clays Practice Round August Cc For those of you who have registered for the NESAHEA Sporting Clays Tournament to be held on Tuesday August th there will be a Practice Shoot offered on Monday August th from noon until pm The American Shooting Center is charging for targets and for targets and you can come as a team or you will be grouped on a first come first served basis SHELLS ARE NOT INCLUDED No reservations are required There will also be a drawing for a gun during the Practice Shoot which will be awarded around pm You must be present to win If you havent yet registered for this great outing you have until tomorrow to be automatically entered in a private drawing by submitting your payment with your registration Registrations will continue to be accepted until Monday August th but those received after August will not be eligible for this private drawing The Two Man Flush Game is new and improved This old game with NEW RULES will have a payout to at least three teams and is designed to support multiple payouts based on participation Although you may shoot as a participant on several teams each Shooter will receive only the highest award that they qualify for This will distribute the Game Pot among several winners Thanks to Enterprise for sponsoring this side event Thanks additionally to all our great sponsors Dinner prepared by Cullen Ranch underwritten by Mitchell Gas Services and TexLa Energy Management Raffle trips sponsored by Cullen Ranch and Cinergy Marketing Trading Corporate sponsors including CORAL ENERGY DUKE ENERGY FIELD SERVICES DUKE NESAHEA Hosts TRRC Chairman Williams in Dallas August th Cc NESAHEA is headed to Dallas Whether you live work or just have customers in Dallas youll want to take advantage of every opportunity to join us on Monday August th at Cityplace just outside downtown Dallas to hear TRRC Chairman MICHAEL L WILLIAMS present an update on the state of the energy industry in Texas A strong conservative appointed by former Governor George W Bush Chairman Williams has been designated as the TRRCs point person for regulatory reform and technology modernization Hes an informative and highly entertaining speaker so make your plans now to attend Cityplace is located at N Haskell and registration will begin at am in the foyer of the Turtle Creek I Ballroom Lunch service begins at noon and the Chairman will speak at pm For directions to Cityplace please call NESAHEA members pay only in advance or at the door Members can also purchase corporate tables of ten for if your registration is received by August th All registrations received wishing to pay at the door will be billed if you do not attend Nonmembers pay or can pay which includes NESAHEA membership through Fax in the bottom portion of this message with your credit card payment or mail with your check to NESAHEA headquarters Dont delay This is expected to be a sellout so register today See you on the th in Dallas NAME COMPANY NESAHEA MEMBER PHONE NUMBER CREDIT CARD NUMBER EXPIRATION DATE AMOUNT PAID TERESA A KNIGHT Vice President Member Services Fax

NESAHEA Board of Director Nominations Cc OLEObj June TO ALL MEMBERS NESAHEA FROM GREGORY A DODD COChair NESAHEA Nominating Committee RE SLATE OF DIRECTORS NESAHEA Board of Directors Ladies Gentlemen The NESAHEA Nominating Committee met to consider possible nominees for the term on the NESAHEA Board of Directors The Committee has selected what it considers to be the four most qualified individuals to fill those terms They are listed below for your consideration Pat Bracewell Manager Cross Regional Accounts Tennessee Gas Pipeline Co Julie Gomez Vice President Enron North America Betsy McMahon Manager Oil Gas Supply AEP West AEP Energy Services Inc Rob Pirt Director Northern Development TransCanada PipeLines The ballot will be sent to all Voting members for action on or before August To receive a ballot and be eligible to vote you must be a Voting member of NESAHEA with dues paidinfull prior to ballot mailing If you have a question about your membership status please contact Eva M Pollard Director of Member Services at Again this letter is for informational purposes only No action is required at this time GADgnomjun

NESAHEAs Annual Sporting Clays Tournament August PA RT II Cc OK now that I have your attention Mark your calendar for Tuesday August th for NESAHEAs th Annual Sporting Clays Tournament to be held again at the American Shooting Centers Prepare yourself for the energy industrys premier shootout remember last years gun giveaway Keep watching your email for upcoming details and registration information Tournament changes and a completely redesigned Two Man Flush game will better accommodate the shooters in this great event Those who register and pay by August are automatically registered for a private drawing sponsored by CORAL ENERGY for a brand new shotgun in addition to all the other great door prizes So get your shotgun out put your team together and send in your registration information once its provided Thanks in advance to many of our last year sponsors who have already committed to sponsorship this year as well as some new sponsors CORAL ENERGY RESOURCES LP DUKE ENERGY FIELD SERVICES EL PASO FIELD SERVICES ENTEX GAS RESOURCES HOUSTON PIPE LINE COMPANY MITCHELL GAS SERVICES RELIANT ENERGY FIELD SERVICES RELIANT ENERGY PIPELINE SERVICES RELIANT ENERGY SERVICES AND SID RICHARDSON If your company would like to join these elite sponsors contact one of our Sporting Clays Committee Jim Cody Jeff Eatherton T Kemp Jones or Matt Lund See you on August th stay tuned for more details

NESAHEA Directory Survey Cc Dear NESAHEA Members In an effort to control costs and to provide more timely current information we are considering putting the annual directory online via our website We want your opinion regarding your personal preference so please take a minute to reply to this email noting the following options below and underlining your choice I appreciate your input and hope you have a great weekend MAINTAIN THE PRINTED DIRECTORY ONLY PROVIDE AN ELECTRONIC ONLINE VERSION ONLY WITH UPDATE CAPABILITY PROVIDE BOTH A PRINTED AND ELECTRONIC VERSION MAKE A CD VERSION AVAILABLE TO THOSE WHO DONT HAVE ONLINE CAPABILITY Teresa Knight Vice President Membership NESAHEA Fax

Sunshine Kids Benefit Golf Tournament March th Cc Dear Members NESA is pleased to be holding its rd Annual Benefit Golf Tournament on Monday March th at the prestigious Champions Golf Club Proceeds will again benefit The Sunshine Kids Foundation This is your opportunity to secure a corporate or individual sponsorship which includes a foursome or a single tee time respectively for this outstanding tournament and great cause Attached are registration forms NESA has been proud to donate over in the last two years to local charities through this tournament and we need your help to continue to do so If you have any questions please feel free to email me or call me at Dont forget about our mixer on Thursday January st at the Boaka Bar downtown No cover first drink free cant beat it RSVP to me if you can make it Visit their website for directions at wwwmercuryroomcomboakaboakahtml TERESA A KNIGHT Vice President Member Services Fax INVITE LETTER INDIVIDUAL REGISTRATION FORMdoc INVITE LETTER SPONSOR REGISTRATION FORMdoc

MEMBERSHIP MIXER JANUARY Cc Happy New Year NESA is kicking off our calendar of events with a mixer on Thursday January from pm until pm downtown at the Boaka Bar The Boaka Bar is located at Prairie right next to the Mercury Room Make plans now to join us theres no cover and your first drink is FREE Take this opportunity to renew your dues and encourage your colleagues to join as well Everyone who sponsors new members between today and January will be entered into a special drawing for HOUSTON TEXAN tickets must be present to win You can bring those new members with you and they can register at Boaka Bar so mark your calendar for Thursday January and meet us downtown You can RSVP to this email just to let us know youre coming and include the name of your guest if youre bringing one TERESA A KNIGHT Vice President Member Services Fax

MIXER TOMORROW THURSDAY JANUARY ST Cc Dont forget to meet us tomorrow evening from pm at the Boaka Bar downtown Located at Prairie the Boaka Bar is right next door to the Mercury Room and your first drink is free Bring a new member with you who pays their dues onsite and youll be entered into a drawing for HOUSTON TEXAN tickets The member who brings the most guests will win tickets to this years HOUSTON LIVESTOCK SHOW RODEO so come out and bring your friends Also mark your calendar for February ths Storage Economics Brown Bag email Lana Moore for details at The next Technical Training class will be March Nominations thru Allocationsand Lana can help with your registration on that as well Have a good week and Ill see you at the Boaka Bar TERESA A KNIGHT Vice President Member Services Fax
